HelpDescription:
I can provide an answer to most of your (Limbus-related) curiosities.
If you seek she who holds the answers, Faust is the name to remember.
...No, let me restate myself.
Not just most. **All** of them.
HelpItems: Sinner-related commands

Faust is here to help look for any query you might have, so learn to speak the language of Faust beforehand.
For further command help, see either `/limbus help identity`, `/limbus help ego`, or `/limbus help skills`
Other commands

Faust also has information on Refraction Railway stages.
`/limbus help rr`
As well as an E.G.O Gift Database for Mirror Dungeon.
`/limbus help gift`
Player-used status effects are available.
`/limbus help status`
HelpFooter: Changelog is available via /limbus help changelog

HelpDescription: Used for searching for Sinner Identities.
HelpItems: Basic Paramters

Specific IDs can be searched with just the Identity and Sinner's names.```/limbus id spicebush yi sang```IDs can be searched via -i```/limbus id -i zwei south```Sinners can be searched via -s```/limbus id -s sinclair```Uptie 3 information is available by adding -t 3```/limbus id -i w corp -s meursault -t 3```
Notice on Skills
Due to Discord's embed length limit, alternate skills and always-active skills are not displayed in an ID's kit. For skill searching, see ```/limbus help skill```
Special Parameters

`-s1 -s2 -s3 -sd -passive -support` will search for `-sin` (Sins), `-damage` (damage types) or `-e` (effects).
An example:```identity -s faust -s1 -sin envy -damage pierce```Will give you FAUST identities that have ENVY AND PIERCE SKILL 1s.
The defense skill that gives shield is listed under 'defend' as a damage type.
If passives and support skills are in the query, it will search for passives and supports that are fueled by only those sins.

HelpDescription: Used for searching for Sinner E.G.O
HelpItems: Basic Paramters

Specific E.G.O can be searched with just the E.G.O and Sinner's names.```/limbus id sunshower yi sang```E.G.O can be searched via -ego```/limbus ego -ego cavernous wailing```Sinners can be searched via -s```/limbus ego -s sinclair```Threadspin 3 information is avalable by adding -t 3```/limbus ego -ego lifetime stew -s sinclair -t 3```
Special Parameters
-cost and a comma-separated list of sins will search for E.G.O that consume only those sins.```/limbus ego -s heathcliff -cost envy, gloom, pride```
More Special Parameters

`-awakening -corrosion -passive` will search for `-sin` (Sins) or `-damage` (damage types) or `-e` effects.
An example:```ego -s yi sang -awakening -sin sloth -e protection```Will give you YI SANG AWAKENING EGO that are SLOTH AND HAVE PROTECTION
Notice on sorting

`-sort` will accept `maxpower, minpower, maxpotential, minpotential` as modifiers in descending order. Do -sort asc 'whatever' to go the other direction.
Adding `-mod` will attempt to include additional coin modifiers, such as conditional coin power (Ryoshu's 4th Match Flame).
Unique to E.G.O, sorting by a sin (i.e. wrath, lust, envy) will sort by sin resists. Only one at a time though.

HelpDescription: Used for searching for Sinner ID Skills
HelpItems: Basic Paramters

Specific Skills can be searched with just the Skill name.```/limbus skill lament mourn and despair```Skill names are searched via -skill```/limbus skill -skill leap```...and narrowed down per Sinner via -s```/limbus skill -s faust```Uptie 3 information is available by adding -t 3```/limbus skill -skill energy current -t 3```
Special Parameters

`-s1 -s2 -s3 -sd -passive -support` will search for `-sin` (Sins), `-damage` (damage types) or `-e` (effects).
An example:```identity -s faust -s1 -sin envy -damage pierce```Will give you FAUST identities that have ENVY AND PIERCE SKILL 1s.
The defense skill that gives shield is listed under 'defend' as a damage type.
If passives and support skills are in the query, it will search for passives and supports that are fueled by only those sins.
Notice on sorting

`-sort` will accept `maxpower, minpower, maxpotential, minpotential` as modifiers in descending order. Do -sort asc 'whatever' to go the other direction.
Adding `-mod` will attempt to include additional coin modifiers, such as conditional coin power or coin reuse.
HelpFooter: The skill query is particularly volatile, and the number of results is subject to change at any given time.

HelpDescription: Used for refining for Sinner ID Skills, E.G.O and E.G.O Gifts
HelpItems:
Faust has manually tagged every Identity, Skill, and E.G.O with the effects that they have, and it would likely be best to simply show you some examples.
For most positive effects, you may search for things such as `haste`, `ally heal sp`, and `party heal hp`
In this case, `ally` will be tagged with effects that target one or more allies, while `party` targets all the sinners on the field.
For most negative effects, you may search for things such as `attack power down` or `self tremor`
`charge` also comes with `charge support` for things such as AEDD Gregor's Spark Discharge, and effects such as `gaze` will be tagged with `pierce damage amp`
For consistency, please keep any effect queries to the actual effect's name, Faust will only deviate so far from glossary definitions.
For your benefit and curiosity, please see
```/limbus help tags```
to see more specifics.
HelpFooter: To hopefully add some ease of use, ID and E.G.O pages have their effect tags listed in the footer.

HelpItems:
```party heal hp, ally heal hp, heal hp```For effects that heal HP. Replace HP with SP for... that.
```charge support```Will be tagged on skills that have any capacity for giving allies charge, such as Charge Barrier, Spark Discharge, or directly giving charge.
```burn spread```Effects like Ishmael's Ardor Blossom Star, where attacking enemies with Burn afflicts random enemies with Burn.
```self tremor count, ally tremor count```For the IDs that use Tremor as a do-nothing counter. Ally Tremor is an example if we ever get anything like that.

HelpDescription:
Faust has information available on enemies in Refraction Railway and their resists, to assist with planning and teambuilding.```-line```Denotes which Railway line you're looking for. Accepts either the Line Number (i.e. 2) or its name (i.e. Mobius), or will default to the latest/most current Railway Line.```-stop```Is required, and denotes which Stop of the Railway you're looking up. Same thing, Stop Number (i.e. 1) or its name (i.e. curse) ((Partial names are accepted.))
As of Line 4, certain nodes are split between a .1 and a .2 wave due to Discord limitations. Use the name.
For those who care, enemy names are spoiler tagged.

E.G.O Gifts and their available upgrades have been deemed a worthwhile addition, for those who need to reference such information.```-gift```Queries the gift name.```-e```Queries effects just like with IDs, Skills, and E.G.O.```-keyword```Searches for keywords.```-abno```Searches for the gift's source Abnormality. 'fusion' will work for fusion gifts in this context, and pack-specific gifts will accept their pack name as an Abnormality.
Faust is currently in development. If you're curious, here is what has changed recently.
HelpItems: ```Fixed error with exact skill name searching did not return only exact skill names if one was found```
```'Inconsequential' backend stuff became consequential error```

```Inconsequential backend stuff
Consequential frontend stuff:
Sorts have been finagled, will sort in descending order by default. Do -sort asc to go in the other direction.
Queries now ignore spaces and special characters, Moth Faust's S3 isn't a nightmare to search for, but -skill . -s ryoshu no longer shows you skills she's SANGRIA'd.```
```Proper fix for brackets in Status Effects```

```Formatting changes:
Skills with empowered versions (i.e. Dawn Office Sinclair's Stigmatize becoming Blazing Strike) will have the empowered skill listed in the Skill description.
Wrestling with the character limit allows Fell Bullet Yi Sang to not force 'Torn Memory' to shorten to 'Memory'```
```Backend rework```
